title: Manage Biofuel Blending Mandate
description: A compliance manager must ensure the company is meeting its government-mandated obligation to blend a certain percentage of ethanol into its gasoline pool.

tasks.description: Retrieve the total volume of gasoline sold in the last quarter and the total volume of ethanol blended.
tasks.expected_outcome: The total sales and blending volumes are compiled.

tasks.description: Calculate the actual blending percentage and compare it to the regulatory requirement (e.g., 10%).
tasks.expected_outcome: The calculation shows the company is currently at 9.8%, slightly below the mandate.

tasks.description: Generate a report showing the deficit and instruct the blending schedulers to increase the ethanol ratio slightly for the current quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: A compliance report is generated, and an instruction is sent to operations to correct the course.
